title: Harissa Ranch Dressing Recipe
full_text:
Harissa Ranch Dressing Recipe
Close

5 mins

5 mins
Serves
6
to 8 servings
Makes
1 cup

(Keep screen awake)

1/3
cup
(
80
g
)
crème fraîche
1/2
cup
(
110
g
)
buttermilk
2
tablespoons

fresh dill

fresh chives

40
g

homemade
harissa
1/2
teaspoon
kosher salt
Directions
In a medium bowl, whisk together the crème fraîche, buttermilk, dill, chives, garlic powder, black pepper, harissa, and salt. Use immediately as a dressing or dip, or store in the refrigerator for up to one week.
